title: ROCKPORT VILLAGE!! Gorgeous 3-Bedroom Townhome - Great Location!
map_address: 3209 Rocky River Drive near Edgecliff Drive
posting_body: 3209 Rocky River Drive | Townhome | $1,299/month | Bedrooms: 3 | Bathrooms: 1 |  Sq Footage: 1,300 |  Parking: 1 Garage | Pet Policy: No Pets |  Security Deposit: $1,299
Living in Cleveland, Ohio doesn't get any better than Rockport Village!!

Conveniently located in beautiful Westpark across from the Metroparks and St. Joseph Academy, Rockport Village offers spacious two and three bedroom individual homes, town homes and apartments, all with the feel of owning your own home with all the conveniences of leasing.
With the Metroparks across the street running, hiking, walking, biking and golfing are right outside your front door.
In the Metroparks you will find access to Lake Erie for boating, fishing, canoeing, kayaking and area beaches.
At home enjoy the beautifully landscaped private grounds.
Shopping, transportation, dining, and entertainment are all within reach.
Rockport Village is located just minutes from downtown Cleveland with easy access to major highways I-90, I-71 and I-480 and the Ohio Turnpike.
Hopkins International Airport, Fairview Park Hospital and Kamms Corner are just a short drive away.
For those who don't drive public transportation awaits you out your front door.
If you're looking for apartments, town houses or single family houses for rent in Westpark, Cleveland or the west side make Rockport Village your choice.
Central Heat- Fireplace- Refrigerator- Oven / Range- Basement Storage- Washer- Dryer- High-Speed Internet / Cable Ready
